channel.description: Recent content in granada on nrd blog

item.title: Granada, España - Day 1
item.description: After a long day the night before, my mom and I weren’t particularly quick to get out of bed. We dragged ourselves downstairs by 10:30am before the breakfast closed at 11. The breakfast was what you would expect from a standard European hotel - lots of cheeses and cold meats, alongside juice and pastries. We had originally planned for this day to be a quiet day to familiarize ourself with the city, and that is almost exactly what it ended up being.

item.title: Landed in Spain
item.description: The next step in our European adventure takes place in the lovely city of Granada, Spain. Our flight from Manchester was only a short 2.5 hours, and customs in Granada was a breeze (the customs agent was super cool, he gave me a stamp). Getting off the plane, we were met with the beautiful Granada sun, pictured below in all of its glory: Our driver was prompt, and spoke little English which was to be expected.
